youtube.title: How Pacifiers Affect Baby Teeth: Dental Impact Explained
youtube.description: Discover the biological impact of prolonged pacifier use on a child's dental development. This video shows why doctors recommend restricting pacifiers to prevent malocclusion and jaw misalignment. Learn the facts about pediatric oral health and baby teeth alignment.
